alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette and west central St. Martin Parishes through 315 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Youngsville, or 7 miles south of Lafayette, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, St. Martinville, Broussard, Youngsville and Cade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
